Salary data for the job search.

A web app for exploring biotech/pharma salary data. Pulls from [r/biotech](https://reddit.com/rbiotech). Built with R Shiny and Docker. [Rshiny app](https://app.victoryuan.com/rbiotechsalary/) / [ojs static version](/rbiotechsalary/) /  [source](https://github.com/wvictor14/rbiotechsalary)
